Grab the order of tips (sample_id) to use as levels for plotting.

tip_order.Rd

Grab the order of tips (sample_id) to use as levels for plotting.

Usage

tip_order(tree)

Arguments

tree

A ggtree object.

Value

A vector of level order.

Examples

counts_q <- system.file("extdata", "qiime", "table-dada2.qza", package = "bubbler")
asv_data_qiime(counts_q) %>%
    asv_tree() %>%
    tip_order()
